content: आश्रवः {@--1@} Stream, river. {@--2@} Fault, transgression; see आस्रव and under आश्रु also.

आश्रव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [आ-श्रु-अच्] Obedient, compliant; भिषजामनाश्रवः <ls>R. 19. 49</ls>; <ls>N. 3. 84.</ls> --वः {@--1@} A promise, engagement. {@--2@} Fault, transgression. {@--3@} One of the categories according to the Jainas; see आस्रव.
